snippet.title: Bass Pro Shops: The Hunt - Live Action Game Trailer
snippet.description: Griffin International today released a new live-action trailer for the upcoming title, Bass Pro Shops: The Hunt (BPS: The Hunt). Available for the Xbox 360® and Nintendo Wii™, players will experience the most immersive hunting game to-date when it hits store shelves in June 2010. Incorporating realistic gameplay with an innovative motion-sensing Hunting Controller (exclusive to the Wii system), BPS: The Hunt drops players into ten different picturesque regions in North America. Aspiring hunters trek the hunting grounds in search of targets making sure to protect themselves from dangerous encounters along the way.
